It is said that “Education can Change the World”. What according to you are the key contributions of Education in Modern Society?
Education play an important role in the life of human being,with the help of education human being can achieve their dream which they pour in their child hood.the key contributions of education in modern society is evey one should aware that how important education is.Government introduced various hightech method to so that student easily grasp in their mind also the smart board culture generate interest in the mind of student to learn new things and implement it.various trust contribute huge money in manufacturing of school and colleges and also there they have to pay minimal fee for their education.also the key contribution is every parent aware that education is necessary for their child for good carrier so parents give their best for educate their child.many private schools are opened every year with high tec technology through which student can grasp easily, they introduce audio visual technique in study pattern which help better understanding in children.but one drawback in these high tech schools is that they charge very high fee so that midle class people cannot effort for their child education and these will create a barrier for middle class people.Laptops and tablets used in schools and colleges for teaching saves time for students to write and make notes.So all these devices i.e smart board,laptop,tablets change the scenario of teaching.
